TopicTitle: Challenge: Lowest Orbit and Safe Return

Articles.Content:
That's right, this challenge is all about low orbit. 

Measurements will be from the Apogee. 

Must orbit 1 time, with out power, the highest Apogee being the 'final' count. 

Then must land safely. 

This is all about control and perfection. 

Stalk parts only.
Oho, now *this* is interesting. I've had an orbit at 35km, +/- 150m, but I've never left it for more'n a single orbit. =)

Well actually 35km will be the lowest possible... So challenge is kinda invalid.

Plus I want to see the challange creator do it..

> 
> Well actually 35km will be the lowest possible... So challenge is kinda invalid.
> 
> Plus I want to see the challange creator do it..

No, you can orbit lower, but you'd need to be really, really precise. Atmosphere ends at 34.5km. =)
invalid challange? I would like to see you hit 34.5 k and orbit 5 times, with out any corrections. It's all about control, can you do it?

> 
> invalid challange? I would like to see you hit 34.5 k and orbit 5 times, with out any corrections. It's all about control, can you do it?

Can YOU do it? If we are going to waste our time getting this right, you should too.
Tim it's a contest, enter you best. I'm trying my best, now go away, you annoy me with you constant cynicism. If you don't feel like participating, don't post.
Do we need to enter the 35km from the launch or we're allowed to go higher, de orbit until circular orbit at 35k, do 5 orbits then return to base?
Do it your best way possible...
Best i have so far is 34601, got lucky with a circular orbit, tried to get closer after i got my 5 orbits and i found out the cutoff isn't 34500, its 34550 >\_> maybe even 34555

Well, as the only one here with any kind of evidence...

..And yes, of course I bloody returned safely. :![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Apogee: 36, 626m (2:24 in the video)

I love the music you choose, nice low orbit. With the acceleration of the game it looks like the little guys are dancing. 

Height 36626 at apex, very nice.

er, did you change the challenge? it WAS 5 orbits if i recall correctly. just came back because i was gonna do it again with screencaps this time before i get stupid and try to drop lower than 34600 xD
yah I changed it, 5 is too many, one good orbit is all I really need. If you do more, best will be taken of course.
I figured that by 5 orbits I would have it nailed anyway. I got bored of waiting and just recorded that one.
